100.name: Luck
100.desc:
<FONT color="#D4FF88">5%</FONT> chance to reset skill cooldown.
Cooldown reset does not apply to Movement, Stand Up, or Awakening Skills and triggers upon the first use of a skill.

100.name: Luck
100.desc: Enhances level 1 effects, multiplying the activation rate by <FONT color="#D4FF88">2</FONT>.

101.name: Critical
101.desc: Enhanced effectiveness. Crit Hit damage +<FONT color="#D4FF88">12%</FONT>.

102.name: Master
102.desc:
Grants a stack of Master on skill use. Master lasts <FONT color="#FFFFAC">10s</FONT> and does not trigger with Movement or Stand Up Skills.
Master: Crit Rate +<FONT color="#D4FF88">1.4%</FONT> (Stacks up to <FONT color="#FFFFAC">5</FONT> times)
<FONT color="#FF9999">1</FONT> stack of Master is lost when hit, but no more than <FONT color="#FFFFAC">once</FONT> every <FONT color="#FFFFAC">0.5</FONT>s.

102.name: Master
102.desc: Increased Master effectiveness. Additional Damage per stack +<FONT color="#D4FF88">1.7%</FONT>.

103.name: Fierce Strength
103.desc:
While HP is <FONT color="#FFFFAC">50%</FONT> or below, Incoming Damage -<FONT color="#D4FF88">6%</FONT> and Outgoing Damage +<FONT color="#D4FF88">3%</FONT>.
While HP is <FONT color="#FFFFAC">50%</FONT> or above, Incoming Damage -<FONT color="#D4FF88">4%</FONT> and Outgoing Damage +<FONT color="#D4FF88">4%</FONT>.

103.name: Fierce Strength
103.desc: Enhanced effectiveness. All bonuses become <FONT color="#D4FF88">twice</FONT> as effective.

104.name: Bladed Shield
104.desc:
On hit, creates a shield that absorbs damage equal to <FONT color="#D4FF88">6%</FONT> of Max HP for <FONT color="#FFFFAC">15s</FONT>. (Cooldown: <FONT color="#FFFFAC">12s</FONT>)
Outgoing Damage +<FONT color="#D4FF88">4%</FONT> while protected by Bladed Shield.

104.name: Bladed Shield
104.desc: Outgoing Damage <FONT color="#D4FF88">+8%</FONT> while protected by Bladed Shield.

105.name: Vanguard
105.desc:
Grants Charge when using a Movement Skill.
Charge: Non-Awakening Skill Damage +<FONT color="#D4FF88">3%</FONT> for <FONT color="#FFFFAC">20s</FONT>.
Grants Valiance on hit.
Valiance: Atk. Power +<FONT color="#D4FF88">3%</FONT> for <FONT color="#FFFFAC">6s</FONT>.

105.name: Vanguard
105.desc:
Gaining both Charge and Valiance at the same time triggers Vanguard.
Vanguard: Outgoing Damage +<FONT color="#D4FF88">5%</FONT>.

106.name: Luminary
106.desc:
Grants a stack of Insight on skill use. Insight lasts <FONT color="#FFFFAC">8s</FONT> and does not trigger with Movement or Stand Up Skills.
Insight: Party Atk. Power Buff based on own Atk. Power +<FONT color="#D4FF88">1.6%</FONT> (Stacks up to <FONT color="#FFFFAC">5</FONT> times)

106.name: Luminary
106.desc:
When Insight is fully stacked, Party Atk. Power Buff based on own Atk. Power +<FONT color="#D4FF88">6%</FONT>.
Skill cooldown -<FONT color="#D4FF88">5%</FONT>. (Excluding Movement, Stand Up, and Awakening Skills)

107.name: Advance
107.desc:
Casting a protective effect on an ally creates an Ether that grants a buff to allies within <FONT color="#FFFFAC">8 meters</FONT>.
(Cooldown: <FONT color="#FFFFAC">10s</FONT>)
Advanced Ether: Weapon Power +<FONT color="#D4FF88">2230</FONT> for <FONT color="#FFFFAC">15s</FONT>.

107.name: Advance
107.desc: When Advanced Ether is created, own Move Speed +<FONT color="#D4FF88">8%</FONT>. Party Atk. Power Buff based on own Atk. Power +<FONT color="#D4FF88">6%</FONT>. Lasts <FONT color="#FFFFAC">15s</FONT>.

108.name: Faith
108.desc:
Grants Faith when using an Awakening Skill.
Faith: Party Atk. Power Buff based on own Atk. Power +<FONT color="#D4FF88">8%</FONT>. Lasts <FONT color="#FFFFAC">3m</FONT>.

108.name: Faith
108.desc: Enhanced Faith effectiveness. Specialty Meter Gain on Hit +<FONT color="#D4FF88">5%</FONT>. Party Atk. Power Buff based on own Atk. Power +<FONT color="#D4FF88">6%</FONT>.

strings.sys.elixir.ui_enhance_option_selection_s:
Why don't you refine the <FONT color='#FFD200'>{0}</FONT> effect?
{1}

How about refining the <FONT color='#FFD200'>{0}</FONT> effect?
{1}

What about refining the <FONT color='#FFD200'>{0}</FONT> effect?
{1}
strings.sys.elixir.ui_main_refine_guide: <FONT color='#FFD200'>Select an effect to refine on the elixir from above.</FONT>
strings.sys.elixir.ui_main_selection_guide:
<FONT color='#FFD200'>Select a Sage's advice from the top.
(Selection cannot be canceled.)</FONT>
strings.sys.elixir.tooltip_guide_state_deactivat:
<FONT color='#FFD200'>[Seal]</FONT>
If you select this advice, the elixir effect will become sealed.
The level of the sealed effect cannot be increased through transmutation, and effects from advice do not apply.
<FONT color='#FFD200'> The sealed effect will become unsealed once transmutation is completed.</FONT>
strings.sys.elixir.tooltip_guide_state_shuffle:
<FONT color='#FFD200'>[Shuffle]</FONT>
When this advice is selected, the transmute level of all elixir effects will move to a random effect.
<FONT color='#FFD200'> You are included in the transmute level's move targets.</FONT>
strings.sys.elixir.tooltip_guide_state_redistrib:
<FONT color='#FFD200'>[Redistribute]</FONT>
When this advice is selected, all transmute elixir effects' levels are added together and then randomly distributed. 
<FONT color='#FFD200'> The sum of the transmute levels before and after redistribution is the same.</FONT>
strings.sys.elixir.tooltip_guide_state_reset:
<FONT color='#FFD200'>[Reset]</FONT>
If you select this advice, the elixir will be reset to before the effect was refined.
<FONT color='#FFD200'> After resetting, you must select the effect again. The transmute count and views of other advice will also be reset.</FONT>
strings.sys.elixir.tooltip_guide_state_exhaust:
<FONT color='#FFD200'>[Depletion]</FONT>
If you select this advice, it will deplete the Sage's strength.
 Depleted Sages <FONT color='#FFD200'>cannot offer any more advice.</FONT>
strings.sys.elixir.tooltip_guide_state_conveyor:
<FONT color='#FFD200'>[Transport]</FONT>
When this advice is selected, all elixir effects' levels will move one step in the designated direction.
<FONT color='#FFD200'> When moving up, the level of slot 1 moves to slot 5, and when moving down, the level of slot 5 moves to slot 1.</FONT>
